Was added for a reason, forgot to use it :P

Shouldn't this just be enemy? Not sure why this needs a new enum. (btw piglin is apparently hostile by default, so it should probably be set as enemy, my bad)

nodes.bodyText: Name can't have a space in it, also this is basically a duplicate of PIGZOMB, cause they are both exactly the same mob (except for texture). I intentionally didn't add a new one because people can just continue using pigzombie.
